pages.text: $(item)Condensers/$ can put $(thing)elements/$ into $(item)Conduits/$ by consuming items of a similar alignment.

The materials for $(thing)elements/$ are:$(br2)Earth: $(item)Big Dripleaf/$, $(item)Copper Block/$, and $(item)Golden Carrot/$$(br2)Water: $(item)Blue Orchid/$, $(item)Lapis Block/$, and $(item)Prismarine Shard/$$(br2)Air: $(item)Lily of the Valley/$, $(item)Iron Block/$, and $(item)Wind Charge/$$(br2)Fire: $(item)Poppy/$, $(item)Coal Block/$, and $(item)Fire Charge/$
